price: Siku watakapo sikia ukelele wa haki. Hiyo ndiyo siku ya kufufuka.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ
footnotes: Siku watapo sikia mpulizo wa pili wa Haki, nao ni wa kufufuliwa watu. Hiyo ndiyo siku ya kutoka kwenye makaburi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma yasmaʿūna al-ṣayḥata bil-ḥaqi dhālika yawmu al-khurūji
